Class Album

java.lang.Object
model.Album
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Album extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an album in the photo album application. Each album has a name, a list of photos, and methods to manage those photos.
Author:
Kaileb Cole, Maxime Deperrois
See Also:
